name: Alien Exploration (GDKO round 1)
description:
Made for gdko2023 Round 1, where we had to create an environment or unique location. I decided to go for a bright colour pallete and some alien plants.

(If the web version doesn't load, downloading the zip may work)

I started the jam half way through and had to cut down, the character controller and the colliders aren't fully finished. (warning, you can get stuck on the edges near the waterfall)

There's a lot more I wanted to add, I may come back and add more in future rounds or in my own time after the jam
